This plugin highlights the content that has been generated by DITA-SEMIA in the preprocess phase. The actual use-case is for demonstration of the plugin's features. In a real document it should look like any other content.

Another purpose is to compensate bugs within DITA-OT. Until version 2.2.1 DITA-OT can't handle embedded SVG content correctly. Thus, all XSLT-Conrefs that generate SVG content can't be displayed correctly with the standard pdf2 transtype.
